languages.text: "О нет, ваше сиятельство, я бы никогда не посмела намеренно подвергнуть наследника прославленной династии фон Валанциус опасности! Однако не могу не выразить свою радость от того, что вы нашли в произошедшем удовольствие для себя".

"Oh no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never dare to deliberately endanger the heir of the illustrious von Valancius dynasty! However, I cannot but express my joy that you took some pleasure in what happened."
languages.original_text: "О нет, ваше сиятельство, я бы никогда не посмела намеренно подвергнуть наследника прославленной династии фон Валанциус опасности! Однако не могу не выразить свою радость от того, что вы нашли в произошедшем удовольствие для себя".

traits.locale_text: "Oh no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never dare to deliberately endanger the heir of the illustrious von Valancius dynasty! However, I cannot but express my joy that you took some pleasure in what happened."

"Oh no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never dare to deliberately endanger the heir of the illustrious von Valancius dynasty! However, I cannot but express my joy that you took some pleasure in what happened."

"Oh no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never dare to deliberately endanger the heir of the illustrious von Valancius dynasty! However, I cannot but express my joy that you took some pleasure in what happened."

languages.text: “噢，不，大人，我绝对不会有意让伟大的冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的继承人置身危险之中！不过，您似乎对发生的一切乐在其中。请允许我表达我的喜悦之情。”
languages.original_text: "Oh no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never dare to deliberately endanger the heir of the illustrious von Valancius dynasty! However, I cannot but express my joy that you took some pleasure in what happened."

traits.locale_text: “噢，不，大人，我绝对不会有意让伟大的冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的继承人置身危险之中！不过，您似乎对发生的一切乐在其中。请允许我表达我的喜悦之情。”

languages.text: «¡No, no, mi{mf|lord|lady}, nunca osaría poner en peligro a{mf|l| la} hereder{mf|o|a} de la ilustre dinastía von Valancius! Sin embargo, si le ha satisfecho lo sucedido, debo alegrarme».
languages.original_text: "Oh no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never dare to deliberately endanger the heir of the illustrious von Valancius dynasty! However, I cannot but express my joy that you took some pleasure in what happened."

traits.locale_text: «¡No, no, mi{mf|lord|lady}, nunca osaría poner en peligro a{mf|l| la} herder{mf|o|a} de la ilustre dinastía von Valancius! Sin embargo, si le ha satisfecho lo sucedido, debo alegrarme».

languages.text: 「ああ、陛下、フォン・ヴァランシウス朝の高名なる後継者を危険にさらす意図など決してありません！しかしながら、起きたことをお楽しみいただけたというのであれば、喜ぶほかありません」
languages.original_text: "Oh no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never dare to deliberately endanger the heir of the illustrious von Valancius dynasty! However, I cannot but express my joy that you took some pleasure in what happened."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、陛下、フォン・ヴァランシウス朝の高名なる後継者を危険にさらす意図など決してありません！しかしながら、起きたことをお楽しみいただけたというのであれば、喜ぶほかありません」

languages.text: "O nein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich würde es niemals wagen, {mf|den Erben|die Erbin} der erlauchten Dynastie von Valancius absichtlich einer Gefahr auszusetzen! Dennoch erfüllt es mich mit Freude, dass Euch das Geschehen offenbar gefallen hat."
languages.original_text: "Oh no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never dare to deliberately endanger the heir of the illustrious von Valancius dynasty! However, I cannot but express my joy that you took some pleasure in what happened."

traits.locale_text: "O nein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich würde es niemals wagen, {mf|den Erben|die Erbin} der erlauchten Dynastie von Valancius absichtlich einer Gefahr auszusetzen! Dennoch erfüllt es mich mit Freude, dass Euch das Geschehen offenbar gefallen hat."

languages.text: « Oh non, Votre Seigneurie, je n'oserais jamais mettre délibérément en danger l'{mf|héritier|héritière} de l'illustre dynastie von Valancius ! Cependant, je suis ravie que vous ayez trouvé du plaisir dans ces fâcheux événements. »
languages.original_text: "Oh no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never dare to deliberately endanger the heir of the illustrious von Valancius dynasty! However, I cannot but express my joy that you took some pleasure in what happened."

traits.locale_text: « Oh non, Votre Seigneurie, je n'oserais jamais mettre délibérément en danger l'{mf|héritier|héritière} de l'illustre dynastie von Valancius ! Cependant, je suis ravie que vous ayez trouvé du plaisir dans ces fâcheux événements. »

languages.text: "Hiç olur mu {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Şanlı von Valancius hanedanlığının vârisini kasten tehlikeye atmaya cüret etmek ne haddime? Lakin olan bitenden bir nebze de olsa zevk aldıysanız ne mutlu bana."
languages.original_text: "Oh no, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never dare to deliberately endanger the heir of the illustrious von Valancius dynasty! However, I cannot but express my joy that you took some pleasure in what happened."

traits.locale_text: "Hiç olur mu {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Şanlı von Valancius hanedanlığının vârisini kasten tehlikeye atmaya cüret etmek ne demek? Lakin olanlardan zevk aldıysanız ne mutlu bana."
